edu.mccc.cos210.fp2014.cm.player.intelligence

Class BruteSearch

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.mccc.cos210.fp2014.cm.player.intelligence.SearchAlgorithm
      • edu.mccc.cos210.fp2014.cm.player.intelligence.BruteSearch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class BruteSearch
extends SearchAlgorithm
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Search algorithm test. testing concept, all of this needs to be rewritten This is a very stupid brute search algorithm. It iterates through all possible moves with a MAXDEPTH and saves them in a Tree. When actually implemented, we should probably decide to search only one depth, then evaluate, etc. We should also use an AiTree instead of a tree for evaluation purposes.
